meanings: a notion of preferring a son to a daughter
prefer a son to a daughter

vlive.korean: 받고 와, 끊은 거 남아있지 않아, 너? Take it. Isn't it still paid for? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

vlive.korean: 뭐가 기억에 남아요? What do you remember most? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
탈색이 남아 있나? Do I have decolorization left? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
[남은 이동권 모두 소진각] 그냥 남아있는 거 계속 쓰면 되지 않나? [Will use all cards.] I can keep using the cards left, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.21
vlive.english: [Will use all cards.] I can keep using the cards left, right?

vlive.korean: 남아 있어 - 남아 있어요? It's still there. - Is it? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅁㅁㄹ🧸

examples.korean: The town still bears the scars of war. 발음듣기 그 소도시에는 아직도 전쟁의 상흔이 남아 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town still bears the scars of war. 발음

examples.korean: That day is stamped indelibly on my memory. 발음듣기 그날은 내 기억 속에 지울 수 없는 각인으로 남아 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That day is stamped indelibly on my memory. 발음

examples.korean: The house was now a shell gutted by flames. 발음듣기 그 집은 이제 화마에 속이 다 타 버리고 뼈대만 남아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house was now a shell gutted by flames. 발음

examples.korean: The faint smell of her perfume lingered in the room. 발음듣기 그녀의 향수 냄새가 방 안에 희미하게 남아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The faint smell of her perfume lingered in the room. 발음

examples.korean: The kids had scraped their plates clean. 발음듣기 아이들이 (음식 찌꺼기가 남아 있지 않도록) 접시를 깨끗이 긁어 놓았었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The kids had scraped their plates clean. 발음
